WorkItem.Description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. create subdirectory in web site, like demo and deply application to this directory in .NET 3.5

2. Run application by typing  http://localhost/demo

Observed:

generated urls start with site root, not from demo . aspx files contain absolute urls like /Site

How to fix this so that multiple applications can hosted in same site ?
WorkItem.Summary: Multiple applications cannot run in same site (urls broken)
